Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's First Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the initial mystery and action involving the Human Meteor, from his introduction to uncovering a Japanese submarine torpedo plot and confronting the enemy.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi to Trouble
sub_scenes.description: Introduces the Human Meteor, Duke O'Dowd, and sets the stage with a seemingly normal taxi ride that leads to suspicious events at the waterfront.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Ride to the Waterfront

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deception and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Focus shifts to the yacht, revealing a trap and Toby's true role, leading to the discovery of a sunken Japanese submarine and a torpedo plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Work and Cabin Trap
Submarine Plot and Toby's True Role

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Confrontation and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor directly confronts the divers, leading to underwater combat and a subsequent attack on the enemy ship to thwart the torpedo plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers' Initial Encounter with Human Meteor
Human Meteor's Intervention and Divers' Hostility
Human Meteor's Threat and Divers' Retaliation
Discovery of Peter's Condition on Ship
Namor's Determined Final Attack and Ship Crew's Fear

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Duke returns to the yacht, investigates Peter's cabin, exposes his treachery, and then visits Holden in the hospital, concluding the immediate threat and setting a positive tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Search for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Exposing Peter's Treachery to the Officer
Evening Reflection after a Chaotic Day
Toby's Home and Invitation to Visit Holden

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Spies
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new narrative focusing on the Liberty Lads and their fight against Nazi spies in a domestic setting, starting with an ambulance arrival and escalating into a confrontation with spies.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and Suspicious Wallet
sub_scenes.description: Introduces the Liberty Lads briefly before transitioning to a suburban setting where boys observe an ambulance arrival and find a wallet, setting up a mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Action Against Nazis
The Dropped Wallet and the Bus Garage Address
Marine Salutes a Civilian - Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Abduction and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Skip and Chuck investigate the bus garage, leading to their abduction by Mr. Horst and a tense interrogation where they overhear a sinister plot.

sub_scenes.title: Office Fight and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Chaos erupts as a fight breaks out, accusations fly, and Major Bronson is shot. This leads to an escape order for Skip and Chuck, initiating a rescue effort.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office
Resolution and Victory Over Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Henry in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows The Champ and Henry as they get caught in Nazi intrigue in South America, leading to conflict with local soldiers and uncovering a kidnapping plot.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduces The Champ and Henry and shifts the setting to South America, setting up a conflict with soldiers in a sleepy town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the Nazi Threat
Setting the Scene in South America and the Soldiers' Search
Confrontation and Fight in the Desert
Escape and the Decision to Seek the American Consul
Explanation of Suspicion: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Kidnapping and Rescue Plan
sub_scenes.description: Focus shifts to El Tigre's kidnapping of Rosita, leading to a rescue plan involving infiltration and confrontation at his hideout.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Entry into Car and Commanded Drive
Suspicious Car Ride and Destination Order
Preparation for Action on Tamale Street
Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout with Stage Dollars
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
Ride to Headquarters and Rescue Resolve
Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Strategy
Machine Gun Deployment and Rosita's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, where he faces combat, disobeys orders for his son's sake, and ultimately is disciplined but achieves his objective.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Starts with intense jungle combat involving Devil Dog Dolan and transitions to a formal report to a superior officer, setting up a conflict between duty and personal motivations.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat with Devil Dog Dolan

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan enters the jungle, leading to a dart attack and an ambush by native warriors, escalating the jungle mission into a fight for survival.

narrative_arcs.title: Note Writing and Plan Negotiation under Duress
Devil Dog's Recovery and Plan Acquisition

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack and Racist Justification
sub_scenes.description: Dolan commits arson, marines launch an attack, and Dolan provides a racist justification for his actions, leading to his capture and Sam's potential injury.

narrative_arcs.title: Native Huts Ablaze Amidst Marine Assault

sub_scenes.title: Native Alliance and Captain's Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: Dolan fights natives, leading to an unexpected alliance after the Chief's death and a dilemma for the Captain regarding Grauer's demands.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Jungle Entrance and Initial Encounter
Fight with Natives and Chief's Demise
Grauer's Dialogue with Native and Alliance
Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Discipline

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Burgess Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of Robert Burgess, leading them to uncover a complex case involving racketeers and a desperate father.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and Burgess Case
sub_scenes.description: Introduces the Twinkle Twins and their role as crime solvers, setting up the central mystery of Robert Burgess's murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story
Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder
Police Station Inquiry about Reilly's Skip

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion and Farnacci's Arrest
sub_scenes.description: The investigation takes a turn as the Twins uncover Farnacci's connection, leading to a community blood drive to save Reilly and ultimately Farnacci's arrest and the resolution of the case.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call to Elijah about Farnacci
Decision to Locate Tom Reilly in Irish Section
Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation about Reilly and Farnacci
Reilly's Coal Chute Escape and Diane's Pursuit
Ambulance Transport and Concern for Victims
Failed Blood Donation Match and Community Appeal
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Response
Decision to Arrest Farnacci and Police Action
Police Raid on Poolroom and Arrest
